conclusion: Preliminary objection partially allowed (non-exhaustion of domestic remedies);Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of Art. 6-3-b;Violation of Art. 6-3-c;Violation of Art. 8;Violation of Art. 13;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF CAMPBELL AND FELL v. THE UNITED KINGDOM - [Russian Translation]
externalsources: Prison Act 1952, Section 47 (1);Prison Rules 1964, as amended, Rule 47;R. v. issue: Prison Act 1952 ; Prison Rules 1964, as amended
